DOC.brief_summary: A Prospective Double-Blinded , Placebo Controlled , Randomized Trial compare single dose Vitamin D ( Colecalciferol ) 300.00UI placebo patient insulin resistance . Primary Outcome : Blood glucose homeostasis model assessment insulin resistance ( HOMA-R ) 90 day . Study hypothesis : Vitamin D treatment may improve insulin resistance decrease glucose level , since association hypovitaminosis D increase insulin resistance .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Single Colecalciferol Dose Insulin Resistance
DOC.criteria: Fasten Blood Glucose > 100 mg/dL < 126 mg/dL Age > 18 year Diabetes Mellitus Use metformin Vitamin D Use Hypercalcemia Chronic Hepatitis HIV
